sen.j: 中村 吉右衛門（なかむら きちえもん）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡。
sen.e: Kichiemon NAKAMURA is a Kabuki actor's professional name.
Kichiemon NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Kichiemon NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.

sen.j: 江戸時代中期に二人、近代に二人が名乗っているが、双方に関連性はなく、代数も別にして数えられている。
sen.e: Two Kabuki actors in mid Edo period and two in the modern era have used the name but those in different periods are not related and hereditary numbering are applied individually.
Two Kabuki actors in mid Edo period and two in the modern era have used the name but those in different periods are not related and hereditary numbering are applied individually.
Two Kabuki actors in mid Edo period and two in the modern era have used the name but those in different periods are not related and hereditary numbering are applied individually.

sen.j: 佐野川屋
sen.e: Sanogawa-ya
Sanogawaya
Sanogawaya

sen.j: 屋号は佐野川屋。
sen.e: The acting-house name was Sanogawa-ya
sen.cmt: 屋号の訳は歌舞伎通訳者の著書による
sen.e: The stage family name was Sanogawaya.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。
sen.e: The stage family name was Sanogawaya.

sen.j: 宝暦を代表する名女形・佐野川萬菊の弟を祖とする家系。
sen.e: The family derives from the younger brother of Mangiku SANOGAWA, who was a celebrated onnagata (an actor who plays the role of women) of the Horeki period.
The family was founded by the younger brother of Mangiku SANOGAWA, who was a celebrated onnagata (an actor who plays the role of women) of the Horeki era (from 1751 to 1763).
The family was founded by the younger brother of Mangiku SANOGAWA, who was a celebrated onnagata (an actor who plays the role of women) of the Horeki era (from 1751 to 1763).

sen.j: 中村吉右衛門 (佐野川屋初代)
sen.e: Kichiemon NAKAMURA (Sanogawa-ya I)
Kichiemon NAKAMURA (Sanogawaya, the first)
Kichiemon NAKAMURA (Sanogawaya, the first)

sen.j: 初代佐野川萬菊の弟、1694–1770。
sen.e: Kichiemon NAKAMURA (1694-1770) was the younger brother of the first Mangiku SANOGAWA.
Kichiemon NAKAMURA (1694 - 1770) was the younger brother of the first Mangiku SANOGAWA.
Kichiemon NAKAMURA (1694 - 1770) was the younger brother of the first Mangiku SANOGAWA.

sen.j: 佐野川十蔵 → 中村十蔵 → 中村嘉津右衛門 → 初代中村喜津右衛門 → 佐野川屋初代中村吉右衛門
sen.e: Juzo SANOGAWA --> Juzo NAKAMURA --> Kitsuemon NAKAMURA --> Kitsuemon NAKAMURA I -->Kichiemon NAKAMURA (Sanogawaya I)
From Juzo SANOGAWA, through Juzo NAKAMURA, Kazuemon (嘉津右衛門) NAKAMURA, the First Kitsuemon (喜津右衛門) NAKAMURA, to Kichiemon NAKAMURA (Sanogawaya, the first).
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせ、読みが確認できなかったものは漢字を補足しました。
sen.e: From Juzo SANOGAWA, through Juzo NAKAMURA, Kazuemon (嘉津右衛門) NAKAMURA, the First Kitsuemon (喜津右衛門) NAKAMURA, to Kichiemon NAKAMURA (Sanogawaya, the first).

sen.j: 中村吉右衛門 (佐野川屋2代目)
sen.e: Kichiemon NAKAMURA (Sanogawaya II)
Kichiemon NAKAMURA (Sanogawaya, the second)
Kichiemon NAKAMURA (Sanogawaya, the second)

sen.j: ？ → 二代目中村吉右衛門
sen.e: ?-->Kichiemon NAKAMURA II
From an actor (undefined) to the Second Kichiemon NAKAMURA.
From an actor (undefined) to the Second Kichiemon NAKAMURA.

sen.j: 屋号は播磨屋 (歌舞伎)。
sen.e: The acting-house name was Harima-ya (name for Kabuki).
The stage family name was Harimaya.
sen.cmt: 原文には「（歌舞伎）」とありますが、リンク先の単語が抽出されるバグのようですので、訳出しておりません。
sen.e: The stage family name was Harimaya.

sen.j: 定紋は揚羽蝶、替紋は村山片喰。
sen.e: The formal family crest is a butterfly and the informal crest is murayama-katabami (a designed creeping wood sorrel).
sen.cmt: Googleなどで見ると「定紋は揚羽蝶、替紋は村山片喰」とあるので、それに合わせてあります。
sen.e: The Jomon (family crest) is Agehacho (a swallow-tailed butterfly) and the Kaemon (alternate personal crest) is Murayama Katabami (a type of family crest with yellow sorrels).
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。また原文には 「家紋は、」とありましたが、リンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「定紋は揚羽蝶、」となっており、本来はこちらの用語を使用していると思われますので、こちらを訳出し、原文修正しました。
sen.e: The Jomon (family crest) is Agehacho (a swallow-tailed butterfly) and the Kaemon (alternate personal crest) is Murayama Katabami (a type of family crest with yellow sorrels).

sen.j: 中村歌六 (3代目)の長男を祖とする家系。
sen.e: The family branch begins with the eldest son of Karoku NAKAMURA III.
The family was founded by the oldest son of Karoku NAKAMURA (the third).
The family was founded by the oldest son of Karoku NAKAMURA (the third).

sen.j: 中村吉右衛門 (初代)
sen.e: Kichiemon NAKAMURA I
Kichiemon NAKAMURA (the first)

sen.j: 三代目中村歌六の長男、1886–1954。
sen.e: Kichiemon NAKAMURA I (1886-1954) was the eldest son of Karoku NAKAMURA III.
The first Kichiemon NAKAMURA (1886 - 1954) was the oldest son of the third Karoku NAKAMURA.
sen.cmt: 統一リストに合わせ、表現を変えました。
sen.e: The first Kichiemon NAKAMURA (1886 - 1954) was the oldest son of the third Karoku NAKAMURA.

sen.j: 尾上菊五郎 (6代目)とともに「菊吉時代」を築いた大正期の名優。
sen.e: He was an outstanding actor who formed the "Kiku-Kichi era" with Kikugoro ONOE VI in the Taisho period.
He was an outstanding actor who formed the 'Kiku-Kichi era' (Kikugoro-Kichiemon era) with Kikugoro ONOE (the sixth) in the Taisho period.
He was an outstanding actor who formed the 'Kiku-Kichi era' (Kikugoro-Kichiemon era) with Kikugoro ONOE (the sixth) in the Taisho period.

sen.j: 初代中村吉右衛門。
sen.e: Kichiemon NAKAMURA I
The first Kichiemon NAKAMURA.

sen.e: Kichiemon NAKAMURA II
Kichiemon NAKAMURA (the second)

sen.e: Kichiemon NAKAMURA (the second)

sen.j: 初代の婿・松本白鸚 (初代)の次男で、初代の養子、1944–。
sen.e: Kichiemon NAKAMURA II (1944-) is the second son of Hakuo MATSUMOTO, who was the son-in-law of the first Kichiemon, and is the adopted son of the first Kichiemon.
The second Kichiemon NAKAMURA (1944 -) is the second son of Hakuo MATSUMOTO, who was the son-in-law of the first Kichiemon, and was adopted by the first Kichiemon.
The second Kichiemon NAKAMURA (1944 -) is the second son of Hakuo MATSUMOTO, who was the son-in-law of the first Kichiemon, and was adopted by the first Kichiemon.

sen.j: 外祖父・播磨屋 (歌舞伎)の芸と父・高麗屋の芸の双方を引き継ぐ。
sen.e: He inherits the artistic skills of both his maternal grandfather, Harima-ya, and his father, Korai-ya.
He inherits the artistic skills of both his maternal grandfather, Harimaya, and his father, Koraiya.
sen.cmt: 原文には「（歌舞伎）」とありますが、リンク先の単語が抽出されるバグのようですので、訳出しておりません。
sen.e: He inherits the artistic skills of both his maternal grandfather, Harimaya, and his father, Koraiya.

sen.j: 中村萬之助 → 二代目中村吉右衛門。
sen.e: Mannosuke NAKAMURA inherited the name of Kichiemon and became Kichiemon NAKAMURA II
From Mannosuke NAKAMURA to the second Kichiemon NAKAMURA.
From Mannosuke NAKAMURA to the second Kichiemon NAKAMURA.
